_header: When sleep had slipped out of my head
_description: A poem on the Last Judgment — six 6-line stanzas (ababcc)

CamStJohn31.First Lines:
When slepe had slipt out of my heade& sundrie thowghtes amaised
                    my brayne…
CamStJohn31.Last Lines:
…to clyve & stycke to crist our headewhose death redemde
                    all Abrahams seade
CamStJohn31.Editions:
Louis,  Cameron. 
             “Two Middle English Doomsday Poems.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         92 (1991): 43-6: 43-4.
